info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued June 2 at 6:08PM MDT until June 2 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Goodland KS
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... East central Kit Carson County in east central Colorado... Southwestern Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Sherman County in northwestern Kansas...
* Until 645 PM MDT/745 PM CDT/.
* At 608 PM MDT/708 PM CDT/, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Burlington to 10 miles south of Goodland to 12 miles northwest of Winona to 9 miles south of Monument, moving northeast at 50 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 70 mph.
SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported less than 1/4 mile visibility in blowing dust ahead of thunderstorms.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
*
This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 69. Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 439 and 450.
Locations impacted include... Colby, Goodland, Burlington, Brewster, Kanorado, Ruleton, and Levant.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
To report severe weather, contact the National Weather Service, or your nearest law enforcement agency, who will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
Strong to severe thunderstorms are also possible behind this wall of dust. Keep updated with this quickly evolving situation.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:45 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:45 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Kit Carson, CO; Sherman, KS; Thomas, KS

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:45 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:45 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Kit Carson, CO; Sherman, KS; Thomas, KS
